description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Laura Bell - Founder, SafeStack.io

ABSTRACT
Moving away from complex monolithic architectures has a range of well documented benefits but also dramatically changes how we have to think about security [...]
Download slides and read the full abstract here:
http://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentation/Practical%20Microservice%20Security
